original_title: Iori3 南洋のOASIS・古川いおり
overview: The lead role of this work is Kocchan and Iori Furukawa! !! A cute and charming older sister with long, shiny hair and a refreshing smile! !! She is a beautiful, serious and disciplined girl who is cheerful and cheerful and loved by everyone. Continuing from last year, this time we will be shooting on location in Miyakojima, a paradise in the South Sea. On a green island full of nature, a good harvest with a charming expression including Kochan's smile. "I hope you enjoy me with all kinds of faces," she said. A beautiful woman with a refreshing smile on a southern island filled with clean water and air is an oasis of our hearts! !!
title: Iori3 South Seas Oasis - Iori Kogawa
